body:
Comment 2: 
0xjâ€¦: The grammar usually accepts a superset of what the semantic analysis will allow.
`foo(bar..., baz)` is valid according to the grammar but not valid according to
semantics.

Builtins are the other way round: The code above is not valid according to the grammar,
so it should be rejected before semantic analysis even gets a chance to look at it.
